segments.text: I see the woman standing there, focused on drying a plate, her attention so absorbed that she doesn't even notice the water pouring over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost surreal how calm she seems, while chaos unfolds around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of concern as the water pools around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She wears a dress and an apron, a picture of domesticity, yet completely oblivious to the mess she's creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the little boy precariously climbing the stool, reaching for the cookies, with the jar so tantalizingly close.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every moment he stretches higher, I brace myself for the inevitable fall that could happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races as I think about the chaos that would ensue if he loses his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR
